title: FortiOS URL redirection attack via the admin password change page
summary: An improper input validation vulnerability in FortiOS admin webUI may allow an attacker to perform an URL redirect attack via a specifically crafted request to the admin initial password change webpage.An attacker could potentially redirect unsuspecting admin users to a malicious website, should they click on a specifically crafted URL provided by the attacker and pointing to the FortiOS webUI admin password initial change page.

operating_system.description: FortiOS: greater equal 5.4.0, less equal 5.4.11, fixed in 6.0.9, 6.2.2
FortiOS: greater equal 5.6.0, less equal 5.6.9, fixed in 6.0.9, 6.2.2
FortiOS: greater equal 6.0.0, less equal 6.0.5, fixed in 6.0.9, 6.2.2
FortiOS: greater equal 6.2.0, less equal 6.2.1, fixed in 6.2.2
